title: What's a good support to one-trick this season?
body: I usually just go for collecting masteries on champs, but if I wanted to get serious and climb, what would be a good choice?

replies.body:
Depends on if you land in trash V or not.

The worse everyone else is, the stronger brand support becomes.
Playmaker supports are good for climbing, {{champion:53}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:555}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:111}}  are good examples as well as mage supports like velkoz, Zyra, and brand.
Thresh mainly, and Leona is still really useful. Morg was also strong, i don't know how she will work after her terrible redesign hits.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenKnight,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5Vru6jG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-23T21:12:44.181+0000)
>
> Thresh, Leona is still really useful. Morg was also strong, i don't know how she will work after her terrible redesign hits.

We've found ourselves here again! Once again, morgana is exactly the same except that her ulti gives her a MS boost when walking towards enemies now. why do you just post everywhere moping about things you apparently have no knowledge of?

> [{quoted}](name=Charm With parm,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E5Vru6jG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-02-23T21:40:04.237+0000)
>
> We've found ourselves here again! Once again, morgana is exactly the same except that her ulti gives her a MS boost when walking towards enemies now. why do you just post everywhere moping about things you apparently have no knowledge of?

I don't know how her W will fare in the game. Besides, my main gripe is her design, not playstyle. And her character is pretty much dead.

Please don't assume what others have in mind, if you don't care to read what they wrote, ok?
Been one tricking sona. Its got me from bronze 2 to silver 3 so far. i might have to start switching it up soon
